Sentencas: The purpose of this paper is to present a brief review of the state-of the-art in the field of water electrolysis science and technology, including a description of the various water electrolysis technologies, and a discussion of the associated challenges and opportunities.

Sentencas: The three main types of water electrolyzers - alkaline, proton exchange membrane, and solid oxide - are considered and described.
